title: Can't login to league and can't download the HRT
body:
Hi,
This morning I could login just fine into LoL, but now it keeps 'authenticating' for 5 minutes before giving the message that there is an unexpected error.
I checked the server status of League, which says everything is fine.
I proceeded to try and download the HRT, but it downloads very slowly, and then cuts off.
Initiating a full repair doesn't do anything either.

Playing YouTube and Netflix videos works just fine
I reset my modem, and wifi, no change in trying to login to league.

What can I do? Is there an issue on Riot's side?

replies.body: It seems like your network might be blocking you from reaching our patching and authentication servers.  Even though you might be able to use other services, you can still run into issues with specific servers.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities, and let me know if helps.

My problem seems to have solved itself. 
I was now able to login to LoL. The login is still a bit slower than with last patch, but nothing problematic.

I have the same problem man and it's been bugging me all day. I was just playing ranked Monday with no problems and this has never happened to me on league unless it was client sided. I got on today to update to patch 7.13 and now all of a sudden I can not log in to the game unless I install and use a VPN which is laggy and uncomfortable. This has been bugging me ever since the patch update. I have tried hard resetting my modem and router, changing settings in my router to have more bypass power, my firewall always stays off, Hextech Repair tool is trash and does absolutely nothing, full repaired the league client, used command prompts "ipconfig/release/renew/flushdns as well as netsh winsock reset, changed dns servers on network adapter and router to 8.8.8.8/ 8.8.4.4... I don't know what else to do. I even read somewhere that checking Internet Explorer advanced setting TLS 1.0 could help.(I don't even have Internet Explorer and have played League just fine all this time). I downloaded anyways just to try it and still no luck. I would reinstall but that literally NEVER works for anyone, I've seen too many threads talking about reinstalls are a waste of time and it's too basic to achieve anything. If you find a fix let me know man.

I'm curious if there might be routing or ISP issue causing hiccups while trying to reach us.  While off the VPN, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a trace to 104.160.131.1.

This will give us a better overview of what's going on.  Let me know your results!
I have the exact same problem and i don't know what to do.Tried everything and even reinstalling the game twice,nothing is changing.
